definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wail, lament (prob. onomatop., cf. Sta:Gesch. i. 388; Aram nh0 (in Lexx) ; Eth.nhya:: is recreari, respirare, etc. Di:632);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנׇהָה]] Mic 2:4 lament sq. acc. cogn.; Imv. [[נְהֵה]] Ez Eze 32:18, sq. [[עַל]] concerning, for.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּנׇּהוּ]] 1Sa 7:2 sq. [[אַהֲרִי]] went mourning after (so most, cf. Th Dr, who argue against Thes were gathered), < rd. ([[ה]])[[ויפנ]], [[וַיִּפְנוּ]] turned after = submitted to (as Ez Eze 29:16) LXX (perh.), We Kit Bu HPS.
